items.title: Pfizer to Face Several Headwinds: Can It Successfully Navigate Them?
items.description: PFE faces a decline in COVID revenues, LOE pressure and IRA impacts but rising EPS estimates offer a glimmer of resilience.

items.title: 5 Dividend Stocks Poised to Profit From the AI Efficiency Boom
items.description: Boring dividend stocks are becoming the smartest way to profit from AI's efficiency revolution.  Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT) is using AI-powered code-completion tools to help developers write code 55% faster.  Johnson & Johnson (NYSE: JNJ) is leveraging AI to accelerate drug-discovery timelines.

items.title: Johnson & Johnson: Undervalued Dividend King With 65% Upside Potential
items.description: Johnson & Johnson offers stability with 62 years of dividend growth and a 3.44% yield. Click for why JNJ is undervalued and poised for potential 65% upside.
